definitions.definition: to push or hit something forcefully and quickly, often with a thin or sharp object:
examples: The doctor jabbed the needle into the dog's leg.

definitions.definition: to make quick forceful hits with your fist (= closed hand) when boxing
to kick a ball hard and quickly:
examples: He jabbed the ball into the net in the final minute of the game.

definitions.definition: a quick hard push or hit:
examples: She gave me a sharp jab in the ribs with her elbow to stop me from saying any more.
